Text.Page:
Everybody knows of the values of rock candies, by now. Cutthroat Harbor is packed with treasurehunters, despite the fact not all could return safely.

, are you also seeking the treasure?
If you obtain some of them, could you, please, let me have a look?

I will surely reciprocate!

You came back safely, what a relief. So how abou them rock candies?

From the looks on your face, it didn't go all too well, did it?
Well, no worries. We should all glad to be alive.

I sincerely thank you for showing me those treasures.
After all, it is not an everyday sight to see, when you can't leave the post like myself.
